item.title: Woman gets 25 years for murder of roommate in Sarasota

item.description: Pelletier was last seen exiting the vehicle he was traveling in to visit family on August 1.

item.title: Endangered Sawfish safely rescued and relocated from Bishop Harbor
item.description: Researchers said the fish may have been trapped by flooding during Hurricane Helene.
